title: Towel, 1794
medium:
Medium: cotton, linen
Technique: cross stitch
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 26 x 36 cm (10 1/4 x 14 3/16 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Designs in style of Italian Renaissance, showing confronted lions, vases of flowers, addorsed birds, and conventionalized floral patterns arranged as cross borders. Edged, top and bottom with bobbin lace ornamented with red cotton dot.

tombstone.epitaph:
Towel, 1794.
1794. Medium: cotton, linen
Technique: cross stitch. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-32.
